doc:
Sonny West (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sonny_West_(actor) 0 Delbert Bryant West Jr. (July 5, 1938 – May 24, 2017), known as 'Sonny' West, was a friend and bodyguard of the late singer Elvis Presley along with his cousin Red West for sixteen years, as part of the Elvis entourage at the Elvis Memphis home Graceland, which became known as 'The Memphis Mafia'. His parents came from the Pontotoc area of Mississippi, not far from Tupelo, from where Elvis Presley came. West was one of two sons and five daughters. Both West and Elvis grew up in different lower income projects in Memphis, and though near, never actually met in childhood. Before and after Elvis' passing, West wrote several books, and made public appearances at Elvis related conventions and gatherings, speaking out on his time working for Presley and their relationship. Delbert_Bryant_West_Jr. ( July_5_,_1938 – May_24_,_2017 ) , known as ' Sonny '_West , was a_friend_and_bodyguard of the_late_singer_Elvis_Presley along with his_cousin_Red_West for sixteen_years , as part of the_Elvis_entourage at the_Elvis_Memphis_home_Graceland , which became_known as ' The_Memphis_Mafia ' . His_parents came from the_Pontotoc_area of Mississippi , not_far from Tupelo , from where Elvis_Presley came . West was one of two_sons and five_daughters . Both_West_and_Elvis grew up in_different_lower_income_projects in Memphis , and though_near , never_actually_met in childhood . Before_and_after Elvis '_passing , West wrote several_books , and made public_appearances at Elvis_related_conventions_and_gatherings , speaking out on his_time working for Presley and their_relationship .
